rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: A 10-kilometer (6.2-mile) control area has been established to limit traffic in and out of the area while extensive testing is done to ensure no other cases, said State Veterinarian Dr. Jeff Kaisand.

rationale: No high-potency verb, metaphor, alert phrase, superlative + negative noun, or intensifier + harm noun found.
